0.2.1.name: wordpress/feeder-pk
0.2.1.description:
Feeder is a great way for Wordpress administrators to text message their readers and broadcast a new post to reader's phones.

Features:

  • Owner Verification of cell phones with unsubscribe feature

  • AJAX sidebar widget form with custom title and terms of agreement.

  • Auto-notification of new posts to subscribers

  • Embeddable Form using [feeder] on any post or page.

Future Features:

  • Custom text messages from admins
